reviewText: Back in early 90s me and my friends had these videos in VHS. We played them so many times that they became unusable! This compilation is perfect in terms of the videos and extras. Hiowever, it would have been better if they could remaster the tracks and maybe try to upgrade the video format, since when it is played on a HD TV the 4:3 ratio doesn't look that good! However... nice piece of collectible for fans
